title: Polygon
description: A polygon defined by an array of 2D points (x, y). A third coordinate (z/height) may be present but will be ignored.

items.description: A point in the polygon. Must have at least 2 coordinates (x, y). A third coordinate (z) may be present but will be ignored.
Coordinate value. First item is x, second is y, third (if present) is z/height (ignored).
